revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=EZVIZ |model=CS-W3-WD1200G |series=AC1300 |ean=6970443213272 |fcc_date=08/17/2018 |is_manuf=No |type=wireless router |fcc_id=2APV2-W3 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ4019 |cpu1_cspeed=716 |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=16 |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip1_model=IPQ4019 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi2_chip1_model=IPQ4019 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=3 |wan_ports=1 |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, 256QAM, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ip=192.168.7.1 }}
:• '''867''' Mbps - 3SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''400''' Mbps - 3SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''1300 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Dual-Band Gigabit Wireless Router}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.ezvizlife.com/item/W3/743}} The Label document at the FCC includes labels for a [[EZVIZ CS-W3-WD1200GR]], [[EZVIZ CS-W3-WD2600G]], and [[EZVIZ CS-W3-WD2600GR]]. The User Manual shows rear panels for two different products; Version A and Version B. Version B adds a fourth LAN port and a USB port and requires 12V at 1.5A. Version B may refer to the WD2600 models which will probably be covered by a separate entry. "exvix", "PCB101214096", and "CS-61015 REV1.0" are silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. *Web GUI: http://wifi.ezvizlife.com
